article_title: What Republicans learned from 2012's "War on Women" rhetoric
article_text:

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Nina Easton

twitter.description:
So… How did the “War on Women” platform work out for the Democrats this election cycle?
Not too well. Let’s start with the WOW campaign’s poster-girl, Texas gubernatorial candidate Wendy ...
